definitions.definition: A moving disturbance , or undulation , in the surface of a fluid .
examples: I dropped a small stone into the pond and watched the ripples spread.
The ebbing tide had left ripples in the sand.

definitions.definition: A sound similar to that of undulating water.
A style of ice cream in which flavors have been coarsely blended together.
examples: I enjoy fudge ripple ice cream, but I especially like to dig through the carton to get at the ripple part and eat only that.

definitions.definition: ( electronics ) A small oscillation of an otherwise steady signal .

main_definition: A moving disturbance , or undulation , in the surface of a fluid .
secondary_definitions: A sound similar to that of undulating water.
A style of ice cream in which flavors have been coarsely blended together.
( electronics ) A small oscillation of an otherwise steady signal .

definitions.definition: An implement, with teeth like those of a comb, for removing the seeds and seed vessels from flax, broom corn, etc.

main_definition: ( textiles ) An implement, with teeth like those of a comb, for removing the seeds and seed vessels from flax, broom corn, etc.
